title: Our Programs
description: The KOM CPC offers a variety of public safety and crime-prevention programs. Initiatives such as community policing patrols, ICBC Speedwatch and event outreach are just some of our most popular.

programs.title: Patrol
programs.description: The KOM CPCâ€™s patrols are our most high-visibility activities, and most popular. Trained volunteers patrol, based on VPD crime data, input from authorities and the community, and historical data, and are required to record information, and communicate with residents and businesses about any recent criminal activities or safety concerns.

programs.title: Road Safety
programs.description: In conjunction with ICBC and the VPD, our volunteers participate in activities such as ICBC Speedwatch and Theft From Auto (TFA) alerts. These activities may coincide with patrols or be part of larger prevention activities involving other community policing centres or law-enforcement agencies.

programs.title: Outreach
programs.description: KOM CPC volunteers take part in numerous community and outreach events, with the goals of improving community safety and providing awareness of policing resources.

subprograms.title: Childrens Educational Scavenger Hunt
subprograms.content: This is a fun and educational event for children and their families. The event is held in a local park and includes a scavenger hunt, face painting, and other activities.

subprograms.title: Outdoor Cinema
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and features a family-friendly movie. Popcorn and drinks are provided, and the event is free to attend.

subprograms.title: Warm Winter Wishes
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides warm clothing and blankets to those in need. The event is free to attend and includes hot chocolate and snacks.

subprograms.title: Valentine's KOMmunity Love
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides free valentines to those in need. The event is free to attend and includes hot chocolate and snacks.

subprograms.title: Shield Your Sip
subprograms.content: This program educates the public about the dangers of drink spiking and provides free drink covers to help prevent this crime.

subprograms.title: Project 529
subprograms.content: This program educates the public about bike theft prevention and provides free bike registration and stickers to help prevent this crime.

subprograms.title: Senioir Safety
subprograms.content: This program educates seniors about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Bike Rodeo
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides free bike safety checks and helmets to children. The event is free to attend and includes a bike rodeo course and other activities.

subprograms.title: Youth Safety Patrol
subprograms.content: This program educates youth about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Car Seat Education
subprograms.content: This program educates parents about car seat safety and provides free car seat inspections to help prevent injury.

subprograms.title: Newcomers to Canada Safety Talk
subprograms.content: This program educates newcomers to Canada about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Community Clean-Up
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides free garbage bags and gloves to participants. The event is free to attend and includes a BBQ and other activities.

subprograms.title: Graffiti Clean-Up
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides free graffiti removal supplies to participants. The event is free to attend and includes a BBQ and other activities.

subprograms.title: Community Days
subprograms.content: This event is held in a local park and provides free food and entertainment to participants. The event is free to attend and includes a BBQ and other activities. (BIA's, CC, etc.)

programs.title: Victim Information Service
programs.description: The KOM CPC provides information and support to victims of crime.

subprograms.title: Lost and Found
subprograms.content: To help recover stolen property, the VPD created the Log It or Lose It program. This program allows residents to register their valuables with the VPD, which can help police return stolen property to its rightful owner.

programs.title: Safety Presentations
programs.description: The KOM CPC offers a variety of safety presentations to community groups, schools, businesses, and other organizations. Topics include personal safety, home security, fraud prevention, and more.

subprograms.title: Newcomers to Canada Safety Talk
subprograms.content: This program educates newcomers to Canada about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Business Safety Presentation
subprograms.content: This program educates business owners about crime prevention and provides free security audits to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Senior Safety
subprograms.content: This program educates seniors about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Volunteer Fairs
subprograms.content: This program educates the public about the benefits of volunteering and provides information about volunteer opportunities with the VPD.

programs.title: Youths
programs.description: The KOM CPC offers a variety of programs for youth, including bike rodeos, youth safety patrol, and road safety education.

subprograms.title: Bike Rodeos
subprograms.content: This program educates children about bike safety and provides free bike helmets to help prevent injury.

subprograms.title: Youth Safety Patrol
subprograms.content: This program educates youth about personal safety and provides free personal alarms to help prevent crime.

subprograms.title: Think of Me
subprograms.content: This program educates drivers about the dangers of speeding and provides free bumper stickers to help prevent injury.

subprograms.title: Pink Shirt Day
subprograms.content: This program educates children about bullying prevention and provides free pink shirts to help prevent bullying.

subprograms.title: Road Safety Education
